main event: A group witnessed three unidentified flying objects emitting blue light on a clear moonlit night in Tariffville, Connecticut.
interesting points: The sighting occurred around 10 P.M. while the group was socializing,The objects were described as being at least 200 feet in diameter and flying at an altitude of 15,000 to 20,000 feet,The objects appeared to have blue neon glow and emitted streamers from their tails as they zipped through the sky,One of the witnesses was high-ranking Navy personnel who had seen the saucer,The group speculated the objects might be part of a military exercise but chose to keep the sighting to themselves.
witness description: civilian group including a playwright and a high-ranking Navy official
